page.title: 15COOPERS GREEN FARM
page.content: Mr and Mrs Brassington have lived at Coopers Green Farm for exactly 50 years this year.Parts of the house were built in 1750,but the main parts of the house between 150 and 200 years old. The farm is a small farm consisting of only 16 acres and therefore only two people work on the farm.The buildings and land of the farm have changed very little over the years,but one change has been to change production from milk to beef.Both Mr and Mrs Brassington find it easy to run the farm and enjoy the work. The farm has 15 beef cows,1 dog,3 cats, 25 ducks,4 peacocks,3male and 1 female, 25 guinea fowl and 15 hens.The peacocks are the most valuable of the birds. S.A.Evans & S.A.Mathews
